content: this is a crochet pattern for two snowflakes one large and one small in english and spanish this crochet pattern is suitable for beginners the pattern includes 1 written instructions in us terms 2 abbreviations used 3 links to the photo tutorials on my website www nordichook com for all the stitches used in this project 4 two charts 5 pattern notes materials you will need any thin yarn i used somerset linen silk yarn 50 g crochet hook size recommended on your yarn label i used size 1 25 tapestry needle measurements small snowflake diameter is 7 cm large snowflake diameter is 10 cm you can purchase a pdf pattern at the nordic hook shop here 1 join nordic hook club to get all ad-free patterns stitch tutorials and e-books in pdf format here 2 1 https //nordichookshop com/products/snowflakes 2 https //nordichookclub com/sign-up/ copyright information this pattern remains the copyright of nordic hook it is for personal use only not to be copied distributed or sold you may create items using this pattern and sell them with credit to nordic hook copyright 2019 © nordic hook nordic hook information website https //nordichook com/ facebook https //www facebook com/nordichook/ pinterest https //www pinterest dk/nordichook/ instagram https //www instagram com/nordic_hook/
